hadiths.text: Abu Mas'ud (Allah be pleased with him) reported Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying:A person from people who lived before you was called to account (by Allah at the Day of Judgment) and no good was found in his account except this that lie being a rich man had (financial) dealings with people and had commanded his servants to show leniency to the straitened ones. Upon this Allah, the Exalted and Majestic, said: We have more right to this, so overlook (his faults)
